channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 16:50 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 14:00 free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region.
